Hello

My name is Alex Carpenter and I am a self-taught front-end developer working at Mighty in the Midwest, making websites and experiences by way of HTML, SCSS/CSS, Javascript and CraftCMS.

Outside of work I am currently exploring Vue.js, GSAP, webpack and fly tying. I also try and spend as much time on the water, actually fly fishing.
